name: Warp runner (itch)
description:
A fast paced action runner game

Warp Runner is a submission to the LowRezJam 2020

The game has 2 modes :
 - Adventure mode, which ends with a boss fight
- Infinite mode, which is ... infinite !

Please share your highscores in the comments !

Controls :

 - Space bar :  fly
 - Arrows or Num pad : teleport to portals
 - P : pause game
 - M : mute music
 - O : take screenshot
 - F : toggle fullscreen

Technical details :

Programming language : C++
Graphics library : SFML
Game framework : NasNas
